channel.title: I got a new computer(vista)
channel.description: I got a new laptop,however, sadly I got some disk images that I want to use, which are alchohal 120% compatable only, but... It says I need to start it first in the admin account, and I am an admin! how do I fix this crud?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 04, 2007, 07:21:15 PM[/size][hr]well I fixed it by starting it up in safe-mode, however, I do not want to do this for every program that needs administrative rights, when I am the admin. Anyway to fix this?
